result.arabic_text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ibuka n’igihe Twebwe Allah, Twabwiriza abamalayika hamwe na Ibilisi Duti: “Nimwubamire Adamu mumuhe icubahiro kimukwiye”; abamalayika baraheza baragamburuka barubama, kiretse Ibilisi yanse kumwubamira.
